# pyspark_dubber.sql.functions.array_join

```python
pyspark_dubber.sql.functions.array_join(
	col: pyspark_dubber.sql.expr.Expr | str,
	delimiter: str,
	null_replacement: str | None = None,
)
```

[PySpark API Reference](https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/api/python/reference/pyspark.sql/api/pyspark.sql.functions.array_join.html)

!!! warning "Incompatibility Note"

    null_replacement is not natively in ibis
